tests.name: SMTP test 1-8
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to send an email using SMTP protocol. SUT sends email to wellformed1@hostname

tests.name: SMTP test 9
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to receive an email. TTT sends an email to Test Address 1(SUT) from wellformed3@hostname. The test lab should verify the receipt of email with subject 'Test Case 9'

tests.name: SMTP test 10
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to reject invalid data as part of DATA command. TTT sends an email to Test Address 1(SUT) from wellformed3@hostname. The test lab should verify the receipt of email with subject 'Test Case 9'

tests.name: SMTP test 11
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to reject bad SMTP commands. The tool will send invalid SMTP commands to intiate the session following exception paths identified in Section 4.1.1 and 4.1.4 of RFC 2821

tests.name: SMTP test 12
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to reject data beyond the size limit. The tool will send data beyond the allowed size limits per RFC 2821 section 4.5.3.1 to the SUT to ensure that they are appropriately rejected.

tests.name: SMTP test 13
tests.desc: Tests the timeouts for various SMTP commands. The tool will keep the transaction open for beyond the specified timelimits in RFC 2821 section 4.5.3.2

tests.name: SMTP test 14
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to receive an email. TTT sends an email to Test Address 1(SUT) from wellformed3@hostname. The test lab should verify the receipt of email with subject 'Test Case 9'

tests.name: SMTP test 16
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to accept a STARTTLS connection. TTT sends an email to Test Address 1(SUT) from wellformed3@hostname. The test lab should verify the receipt of email with subject 'STARTTLS

tests.name: SMTP test 17
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to reject invalid STARTTLS commands.The tool sends invalid STARTTLS commands and check for server behavior.

tests.name: SMTP test 20
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to accept a PLAIN SASL connection. TTT sends an email to Test Address 1(SUT) from wellformed3@hostname. The test lab should verify the receipt of email with subject 'PLAIN SASL

tests.name: SMTP test 22
tests.desc: Tests the ability of SUT to reject a PLAIN SASL connection. TTT tries to authenticate with SUT using bad username/password
